experience.title: experience
experience.description: Over the past 10 years, Devoloped many projects from Scratch, Such as E-commerce shops, Porfolios and Websites for companies, Integrated LiveChats and Live Forums for Webistes, On top of that I have strong backgroud in Crypto Space and Web 3 Space, Developed Volume Bot in Spl token.

hard-skills.title: hard-skills
hard-skills.description:
Leadership & Collaboration,Proven ability to lead cross-functional teams towards common goals, fostering collaboration and motivation among team members.
Communication & Stakeholder Management,Problem-solving & Adaptability, Organization & Time Management,Negotiation & Empathy

soft-skills.title: soft-skills
soft-skills.description: Proficient in project management tools (e.g., Microsoft Project, Jira), Agile methodologies, risk management, budgeting, stakeholder management, contract negotiation; and development in Java, Python, JavaScript (React.js, AngularJS), database management (MySQL, MongoDB), version control (Git), software testing (JUnit, Selenium), deployment (Jenkins, Docker), cloud computing (AWS, Azure), and mobile development (Swift, Kotlin, React Native)
